tool_description: Generates prioritized alerts and notifications based on sensor validation results, anomaly detection, and predefined threshold violations.

sensor_identifiers.description: Sensor IDs corresponding to validation and anomaly data

alert_thresholds.description: Custom alert threshold values for each sensor

priority_levels.description: Priority assignments for each sensor: low, medium, high, critical

alert_cooldown_seconds.description: Minimum time between duplicate alerts for the same sensor (10-3600)

enable_predictive_alerts.description: Whether to generate alerts for predicted future issues

vehicle_context.description: Current vehicle operational context for alert prioritization

driver_notification_level.description: Driver notification level: minimal, standard, detailed

maintenance_mode.description: Whether vehicle is in maintenance/diagnostic mode

location_data.description: GPS coordinates [latitude, longitude] for location-aware alerts

weather_conditions.description: Current weather conditions affecting alert interpretation

error_messages: Array length mismatch: validation_results, anomaly_scores, and sensor_identifiers must have the same length.
Invalid anomaly score: All anomaly scores must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid priority level: Priority levels must be 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'critical'.
Invalid cooldown period: alert_cooldown_seconds must be between 10 and 3600.
Invalid notification level: Use 'minimal', 'standard', or 'detailed' for driver_notification_level.
Invalid location format: location_data must contain exactly 2 numeric values [latitude, longitude].
Threshold mismatch: If provided, alert_thresholds array must match the length of sensor_identifiers.
usage: Provide validation_results, anomaly_scores, and sensor_identifiers arrays. Optionally configure alert behavior with thresholds, priorities, cooldown settings, and contextual information for more intelligent alerting.

active_alerts.description: List of currently active alert messages

alert_priorities.description: Priority level for each active alert

alert_timestamps.description: Timestamp when each alert was generated
